name: Spero Foods
long_description:
Spero is affordable, clean, sustainable plant-based dairy.

With 21 global patent apps and novel process engineering for high throughput low cost plant dairy, Spero recreates staple foods you love, in ways that are good for you and the planet.

name: Simmer
long_description:
Today’s delivery apps are bad experiences. First, you have to choose a delivery platform. Then, you scroll through dozens of restaurant and finally, you decide between hundreds of dishes. And even if you choose the right restaurant, you might get the wrong dishes.

On Simmer, we tell you the best reviewed dishes across all delivery apps. You first choose your dish on Simmer, and the delivery companies just take care of logistics. Through this, we are able to charge affiliate revenue for every order.

No one has done this before because determining a city’s best dishes requires millions of users to leave dish reviews.

Our unique insight is that all the data required already exists online, in blog posts, social media, newspapers. It just needs to be aggregated, analyzed, and indexed. We have built a custom sentiment analyzer to do just that.

Our vision is to be the first place people go when ordering delivery. 

The founders have backgrounds in engineering and data science from UChicago (their alma mater) and they have both worked at food tech companies like Lolli and Pops and Blue Apron.
one_liner: We do reviews for dishes. Our app helps users find the very best…

name: Shef
long_description:
At Shef, we’re rebuilding the food system from scratch, redefining who can participate in the food economy, and returning personal connection to the making, eating, and sharing of food. 

Shef is an online marketplace for local, food safety certified cooks to connect with customers in their community and earn a meaningful income selling homemade dishes. 

75% of shefs are women and 80% are people of color. Together, they represent nearly 100 countries around the world, from Algeria to Korea, to India and Venezuela. Shefs are aunties and abuelas, immigrants and refugees, stay-at-home parents and restaurant dreamers. They’re passionate local cooks in your community who are doing what they love most — sharing their food and culture with you. 

Shef is also part of a growing movement to build a more inclusive food system for all. We are proud to support and champion advocacy efforts to expand home cooking laws across the country so that talented cooks everywhere can earn a meaningful income from their own kitchens. 

Join us: https://jobs.lever.co/shef
one_liner: Shef is a Marketplace for Homemade Food

name: Eat Blueprint
long_description: Making Blueprint Protocol-inspired meals for longevity and performance. Organic, local, gluten-free, and seed oil free.

name: Locale
long_description:
We partner with top Bay Area restaurants to bring you prepared meals that stay fresh all week. Meals are delivered weekly and ready in minutes.

Since starting in 2020, we’ve delivered 100K+ orders and are backed by a16z, Y-Combinator, Goodwater, Decent Capital, and other top investors.
one_liner: Bringing you the perfect meals for your busy life

name: Sekilo
long_description:
Sekilo - Poultry processing & supply chain for the SME foodservice industry.

A category-first consumer food company is revolutionizing the poultry industry with innovative technology. At the forefront of poultry distribution and processing, our robust supply chain, fortified with stringent cold chain control, guarantees excellence from procurement to final delivery, setting a new industry standard. Our unwavering commitment addresses client pain points—ensuring unparalleled quality, hygiene, freshness, and multiple drops with a low MOQ.

As a startup deeply rooted in logistics and supply chain expertise, Sekilo is the trusted partner for the diverse needs of the middle-downstream foodservice sector. Delivering cutting-edge solutions in warehouse management, inventory control, operations, delivery logistics, customization, and processing management, we cater to catering SMEs, HORECA chains, industry players, e-grocery startups, and D2C processed meat factories. Embracing technology, Sekilo optimizes Indonesia's poultry supply chain.

With robust supply chain capabilities, customization, an efficient business model, and an unwavering commitment to consistency, Sekilo is reshaping the poultry distribution and processing landscape.
one_liner: Poultry processing & supply chain for the SME foodservice industry.

name: Chow Central Inc
long_description:
Chow Central is building virtual restaurant chains for Africa. 

We partner with under-utilised commercial kitchens to scale brands and serve customers with 10x lower costs than setting up traditional brick-and-mortar restaurants. We make $105K monthly revenue with 30% gross margins.

Our customers love our delicious recipes and they love our faster & cheaper deliveries. 

Wanna know our secret recipe? Contact: founders@500chow.com
one_liner: Asset Light Restaurant Chains for Africa
